# CloudQuery

INGESTION

CloudQuery is an open-source data integration platform that enables the transformation of cloud assets into SQL-accessible databases. It helps organizations extract, transform, and load (ETL) data from various cloud providers into a format suitable for analysis and monitoring. CloudQuery supports a wide range of cloud services and offers a flexible configuration for custom data pipelines.

## CloudQuery + MotherDuck

CloudQuery integrates with MotherDuck by allowing users to load and transform data from multiple cloud sources directly into the MotherDuck cloud data warehouse. This integration leverages CloudQueryâ€™s ETL capabilities to efficiently funnel data into MotherDuck, making it accessible for advanced analytics and querying through DuckDB's SQL engine.
